org.bouncycastle.jcajce.util

Class ProviderJcaJceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bouncycastle.jcajce.util.ProviderJcaJceHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JcaJceHelper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BCJcaJceHelper

    public class ProviderJcaJceHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements JcaJceHelper
    JcaJceHelper that obtains all algorithms from a specific Provider instance.
